entry.title: Crochet Creator Crafts Functional DDR Pad
entry.content:
You can now dance dance away with your fingers using some tech wizardry plus crochet. TikTok creator kims_threads (Via Polygon) posted a tutorial explained how they made a functional DDR pad by crocheting yarn, weaving conductive thread in-between the crocheted pattern, and plugging the creation into the open-source software project Arduino. They then shows footage of them playing DDR with their fingers.
As Polygon points out, you could enlarge the project in theory by crocheting granny squares, making a cozy and customizable full-size DDR mat. Such a mat would need some extra work or a base mat to place under it so that it wouldn't slip around while you are trying to dance.
Kims_threads has yet to upload a pattern for the creation, though they might, as they sell several other patterns on her Etsy shop. However, they used a tutorial from Popular Science as a baseline for their own creation. With some trial, error, and ingenuity, you could make your very own crochet DDR pad.
This is just one of Kims_threads video game/tech-themed projects, which include a knit Animal Crossing beanie and a AR-enabled, crochet Tamagochi tapestry.
Fun fact: crochet, unlike knitting, cannot be done by machines (yet). I'll believe the robot overlords are coming for us when they can crochet a DDR pad of their very own.
Video credit: kims_threads via Tiktok


詳細句子文法解析：
1. You can now dance dance away with your fingers using some tech wizardry plus crochet.
這是一個由"with/using + 名詞"構成的片語，可以表示所使用的工具或方式。此外，英文中經常使用倒裝句，使句子更加生動。本句中的"dance away"則表示以很大的熱情或心情來跳舞。

2. TikTok creator kims_threads (Via Polygon) posted a tutorial, explained how they made a functional DDR pad by crocheting yarn, weaving conductive thread in-between the crocheted pattern, and plugging the creation into the open-source software project Arduino.
本句經由"by + Ving"表達了一個因果關係，並強調製作DDR板墊所使用的方法和步驟。此外，“in-between”的使用則可以用來表示物體之間的距離和關係。

3. They then show footage of them playing DDR with their fingers.
"then"在此句子中用來表示「時間上的先後關係」。此外，利用名詞來句子主語，所使用的動詞也要隨之變化。

4. As Polygon points out, you could enlarge the project in theory by crocheting granny squares, making a cozy and customizable full-size DDR mat.
此句為一個方式狀語從句。 "in theory"表示「理論上」，強調創造此物體的可能性。

5. Such a mat would need some extra work or a base mat to place under it so that it wouldn't slip around while you are trying to dance.
本句中使用了"would"表達假設的情況，表示「如果……將會……」。此外，"so that"常常與to不定詞搭配使用，表達目的的含義。

6. Kims_threads has yet to upload a pattern for the creation, though they might, as they sell several other patterns on her Etsy shop.
此句為一個“as”引導的時間狀語從句，主要表示動作發生的同時。本句也表示一個狀態，使用"have yet to"表達某件正在進行的事情。

7. ...they used a tutorial from Popular Science as a baseline for their own creation.
標點符號的使用，可以使一個句子在語義上更加清晰。這裡的"..."表達了"（在可接受的範圍內）省略了一些信息"的意思。

8. With some trial, error, and ingenuity, you could make your very own crochet DDR pad.
此句子利用了"With"的用法表達一個工具，後面則是表達了簡單的條件句，帶給讀者一個跨越差距，從"我不知道如何做到"，到"我也能創造這個產品"的感覺。

9. Fun fact: crochet, unlike knitting, cannot be done by machines (yet).
本句作為提示或者引言，开头写有“Fun Fact”三个单词，表示此处是一个有趣的科普小知识。

10. I'll believe the robot overlords are coming for us when they can crochet a DDR pad of their very own.
本句是一个表达条件的假设，一般借助于when, unless等引导词来表达，意思是“条件成立才能做到某事”。

單字及提供（拆解後詞彙聯想）：
1. wizardry（n.) 魔術
wizard（n.) 巫師
weasel（n.) 黃鼠狼
2. conductive（adj.) 有導電性的
conduct（n.) 行為；舉止；導電
3. customize(v.) 定制
custom（n.) 風俗習慣；定制貨
costume（n.) 服裝
4. ingenuity(n.) 機智；創造力
genius（n.) 天才
genuine（adj.) 純真的
5. crochet（n./v.) 鉤編
crocodile（n.) 鱷魚
cricket（n.) 蟋蟀
6. enlarge(v.) 擴大
large(adj.) 巨大的
largely(adv.) 大部分地
7. tutorial(n.) 教程
tutor（n.) 家庭教師
tortoise（n.) 烏龜
8. footage(n.) 片段、影片
foot（n.) 腳、腳步
food（n.) 食物
9. cozy(adj.) 舒適的
cosy (英國英語)
cozy up cuddle/cosy down sleep (phrasal verb) 癱坐著溫馨地相擁/舒適下降睡覺
10. functional(adj.) 功能性的
function(v.) 運作、運轉
finale(n.) 終曲、結局

片語（相似及反義片語）：
1. dance away - 相似片語：搖滾離去、收拾好離開；反義片語：無欲无求、毫無動力
2. by + Ving - 相似片語：by chance（偶然地）, by design（故意）、by + N（by bike）（搭乘...）
3. would + Vr. - 相似片語：could + Vr.(能夠)、should +Vr. (應該)、may + Vr.（可能）
4. sell + N - 相似片語：sale + N、Sell out （售空）、sell to N（售給...）
5. so that - 相似片語：without + N (沒有...)、with + N (有...)
6. have yet to + V (尚未...) - 相似片語：be about to (就要...)、have already (已經...)
7. as...as... (和...一樣...) - 相似片語：not as...as... (不如...)
8. With + N - 相似片語：At +N(在...方面)，without+ N(忽略...), except +N (除了...)
9. unlike (不像) - 相似片語：just like（像...一樣), poor likeness (不像，還原度差)
10. when + S + V (當...) - 相似片語：if + S + V（如果...）, while + S + V (當...的時候)
